overview:
Reginald Babcock is a co-founder of RESOLUTE Partners. He provides guidance and counsel to the organization as Chairman of the Board of Directors.

Reg co-founded and is executive director of the Angel Investor Forum, Inc., a Connecticut-based organization of individual investors, and member of the Angel Capital Association, a U.S. best practices organization affiliated with the Kauffman Foundation. The Angel Investor Forum receives financial support from its members, Connecticut Innovations, Inc., Yale University, the University of Connecticut and other organizations.
